main event: A witness observed a fast-moving cigar-shaped object emitting sparks while driving near Ishpeming, Michigan on July 19, 1955.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 500 feet above the terrain,The sighting lasted between three to five seconds,The object moved in a northerly direction before disappearing behind trees,The sighting was made from a car approximately one mile away,There was a delay in reporting the sighting which may have affected the availability of information.
witness description: the observer was driving a car
